title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 303.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 303.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) These regulations are promulgated pursuant to General Business Law (GBL), article 33-B, section 697-a, added by
chapter 662 of the Laws of 2005 as amended by chapter 706 of the Laws of 2006. They set forth the procedures for the operation of an alternative
arbitration mechanism (the program) as required by GBL section 697-a(c). (b) These regulations are
designed to promote the independent, speedy, efficient and fair disposition of disputes concerning defective farm equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
303.1

Adopted

New York State Register July 31, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 31, eff. 7/31/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
